name: Customer Portal
business_function: Public-facing web portal allowing customers to view, purchase, and modify subscription-based services
data_handled: Names, addresses, billing info, subscription details
dependencies: Billing API, CRM backend, AWS RDS PostgreSQL, Stripe payments
business_impact: Major customer-facing system. Outage disrupts self-service, reducing revenue and increasing support load.
freeform_description: A responsive customer portal handling account management. Hosted on AWS ECS with CloudFront CDN. Integrates with CRM and billing systems.

name: Internal HR System
business_function: Manages payroll, performance reviews, employee onboarding, and HR document storage
data_handled: Employee files, payroll data, compensation info
business_impact: Critical for HR operations. Breach exposes sensitive employee records, causing compliance violations.
freeform_description: Central HR suite for managing employee lifecycle. Runs on internal VM infrastructure and ties into Active Directory.

name: Payment Processing API
business_function: Handles secure card transactions and payment authorizations for e-commerce operations
internet_exposed: Yes - Restricted access (VPN, IP whitelist, etc.)
dependencies: Banking gateway, Fraud detection service, Azure SQL
business_impact: Failure disrupts all transaction processing, directly impacting revenue.
freeform_description: PCI-sensitive API handling high-volume transactions. Hosted on Azure Kubernetes Service with private networking.

name: Analytics Warehouse
business_function: Centralized data warehouse supporting BI dashboards and advanced analytics
data_handled: Aggregated business metrics, pseudonymized customer behavior data
dependencies: BigQuery datasets, ETL pipelines, CRM exports
business_impact: Degraded analytics visibility impacts decision-making across departments.
freeform_description: Central BI warehouse built on BigQuery with Looker dashboards.

name: Mobile Ordering App
business_function: Allows customers to place online orders, view menus, and track deliveries
data_handled: Order details, delivery addresses, user preferences
dependencies: Delivery routing service, Payment API, Internal inventory DB
business_impact: Critical for customer experience; outage halts revenue-generating orders.
freeform_description: Hybrid mobile ordering app with AWS back-end and on-prem POS integration.

name: Inventory Management System
business_function: Tracks stock levels, manages restocking workflows, and connects suppliers
data_handled: SKU info, supplier data, warehouse locations
business_impact: Incorrect stock levels disrupt supply chain and customer fulfillment.
freeform_description: Core inventory tracking platform interfacing with ERP and external suppliers.

name: Corporate Email System
business_function: Handles internal and external corporate email communications
internet_exposed: Yes - Restricted access (VPN, IP whitelist, etc.)
business_impact: Core communication channel; compromise leads to phishing risk, data loss, and reputational impact.
freeform_description: Enterprise-grade email system with ATP and conditional access controls.

name: Vendor Portal
business_function: Allows suppliers and partners to upload invoices, track payments, and manage contracts
internet_exposed: Yes - Restricted access (VPN, IP whitelist, etc.)
dependencies: Financial ERP system, Storage account, SAP gateway
business_impact: Delays in vendor processes disrupt procurement and financial operations.
freeform_description: Secure external-facing vendor portal tightly integrated with the financial ERP.

name: R&D Compute Cluster
business_function: Provides GPU/CPU compute for ML training, simulations, and internal research
dependencies: Object storage, Git repo, ML pipeline
business_impact: Research productivity slows significantly if compute is unavailable.
freeform_description: Hybrid compute environment using GCP GPUs with local HPC nodes.

name: Incident Management System
business_function: Tracks operational incidents, change requests, and service outages
data_handled: Incident logs, configuration items, user tickets
business_impact: Degrades IT service coordination and slows resolution workflows.
freeform_description: Internal ITSM platform used across the organization for incident workflows.
